Package org.jerkar

Contains core classes of Jerkar.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JkBuild Base class defining commons tasks and utilities necessary for building any kind of project, regardless involved technologies.
JkBuildPlugin A plugin base class to extend to alter JkBuild object.
JkBuildPlugins Set of plugins configured or activated in a JkBuild.
JkClassLoader Wrapper around URLClassLoader offering convenient methods and fluent interface to deal with URLClassLoader.
JkClasspath A sequence of file to be used as a class path.
JkConstants Holds constants about project structures
JkJavaCompiler Stand for a compilation setting and process.
JkJavaProcess Offer fluent interface for launching Java processes.
JkLocator Provides location related to the running Jerkar instance.
JkLog Logger to use to display any relevant information on the running build.
JkModelMethod  
JkOptions  
JkProcess Offers fluent API to define and launch external process.
JkProjectDef Defines the build classes defined on a given project.
JkProjectDef.JkProjectBuildClassDef Defines methods and options available on a given build class.
JkProjectDef.JkProjectBuildMethodDef Definition of method in a given class that can be called by Jerkar.
JkProjectDef.JkProjectBuildOptionDef Definition for build option.
JkScaffolder Class for creating project from scratch.
 

Exception Summary
JkException Exception launched to break the build.
 

Annotation Types Summary
JkDoc Documents the annotated element so that, Jerkar can display some information when 'help' or 'helpPlugins' are requested.
JkImport Specifies the libraries necessary to compile and run the annotated class as a Jerkar build.
JkOption Defines the annotated field as an option, meaning that this field value can be set in the command line while running Jerkar.
JkProject Specifies that the annotated element is a build of a another project.
 

Package org.jerkar Description

Contains core classes of Jerkar.
